verbose_text: In clinical studies, the Sequenced Treatment Alternatives to Relieve Depression (STAR * D) trial demonstrated that bupropion, a dopamine and noradrenaline reuptake inhibitor, augments antidepressant action of SSRI in patients with incomplete response to initial SSRI treatment [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], supporting the role of D1 receptors for the enhancement of antidepressant action.
evidence: noradrenaline reuptake inhibitor, augments antidepressant action of SSRI
